backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature request to add a 14px disclaimer to HomePage.tsx with associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries for various frontend files detailing layout, design, and page content.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navigation, content outlet, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus and active route styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity login, storage, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind global styles defining copper-themed color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads styles.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page component returning null.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Renders a hero section and multiple division cards describing the Brotherhoodâ€™s specialized branches with images and text. Primarily static content with styled cards for each division.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays a hero header and narrative history cards detailing the origins of the Copper Age and key early events. Content is fully static and storytelling-focused.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage hero section and feature cards linking to other site sections like lore, ranks, and divisions. Emphasizes navigation and visual presentation.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a detailed photo card featuring the T-10 power armor and its accessories. Contains static imagery and descriptive labels.

frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Presents armor and uniform variants per rank using structured cards and lists. Focuses on static descriptive details of equipment by rank.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, keyframes, animations, and custom themes with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, required page/content updates, and architectural notes for expanding the Brotherhood of Copper site with new sections and layout changes.
